name: Samurai Drop - only jump to move!
name_original: Samurai Drop - only jump to move!
description:
By Salman Shurie (https://twitter.com/Salman_Shh) Playing it in fullscreen is highly recommended Controls
  • Hold LEFT Click & Drag - to Aim Jumps
  • mousewheel - to find mouse position.
  • Press R to Restart!
  • Collide with things to attack!
